entry.title: WIND WARNING, Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 a.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 90 gusting to 110 late this evening then diminishing to 70 gusting to 90 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
